description.para: This is a list of users that should be allowed to login to this service. Names starting with '@', '+' and '&' are interpreted using the same rules as described in the invalid users parameter.
If this is empty (the default) then any user can login. If a username is in both this list and the invalid users list then access is denied for that user.
The current servicename is substituted for %S. This is useful in the [homes] section.

value.comment: No valid users list (anyone can login)
